response.data:
{
  "pocVersions": [
    {
      "cost": 25300,
      "features": [
        "Patient Engagement and Session Management: Build the core scheduling, tracking, and session management system to enable service delivery.",
        "Patient Onboarding via Chatbot: Automate patient intake and data collection to improve operational efficiency for coaches.",
        "AI Health Coach Chatbot Interface: A basic, scripted version for onboarding and sending automated reminders/follow-ups linked to sessions."
      ],
      "focus": "revenue",
      "id": "poc-rev-001",
      "timeEstimate": "5-6 weeks",
      "title": "Rapid Service Delivery Platform"
    },
    {
      "cost": 34100,
      "features": [
        "AI Health Coach Chatbot Interface: A polished, conversational demo to showcase the core user experience.",
        "Continuous Learning System (Prototype): Demonstrate the AI's ability to improve from feedback, proving the model's scalability and defensibility.",
        "Clinical Insight Generation Engine (Demo): Process a sample dataset to generate a compelling dashboard, showing the B2B data value proposition.",
        "Patient Onboarding via Chatbot: A 'happy path' onboarding flow to populate the system with data for the demo."
      ],
      "focus": "fundraising",
      "id": "poc-fund-001",
      "timeEstimate": "7-8 weeks",
      "title": "Vision & Scalability Showcase"
    },
    {
      "cost": 30800,
      "features": [
        "Technical Spike: HIPAA-Ready Architecture: Design and build the foundational infrastructure on HIPAA-eligible services to ensure future compliance.",
        "Technical Spike: AI Safety via RAG: Implement a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline to ground the AI in a curated knowledge base, mitigating hallucinations.",
        "AI Health Coach Chatbot Interface (Prototype): A minimal interface to test and prove the safety and accuracy of the RAG system.",
        "Feedback Loop for Continuous Learning: Create a simple mechanism for a human to correct AI responses and update the knowledge base."
      ],
      "focus": "risk-mitigation",
      "id": "poc-risk-001",
      "timeEstimate": "6-7 weeks",
      "title": "Feasibility & Safety Core"
    }
  ]
}
